TEXT: The applicants , whose names appear in the appendix , are NORP nationals .
They are represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in GPE ( GPE ) .
s , may be summarised as follows .
The applicants , accused of being members of the illegal organisation Dev - Yol ( PERSON ) , were taken into police custody on various dates DATE and DATE .

In DATE , the military public prosecutor instituted criminal proceedings against the applicants in GPE . It was alleged that the applicants were members of an illegal organisation aiming to undermine the constitutional order and to replace it with a NORP - Leninist regime . The prosecution called for the applicants to be sentenced pursuant to LAW of LAW , which regulates felonies against the state .
The applicants were released pending trial ( PERSON on DATE , PERSON on DATE , ORG on DATE and PERSON on DATE ) .

On DATE ORG delivered its judgment . It convicted PERSON and PERSON as charged and sentenced them to imprisonment . The ORG further decided that PERSON and Mesut Uygun be acquitted of the charges against them . On DATE the decision as to the acquittal of ORG became final , as the public prosecutor did not appeal against him .

The public prosecutor challenged the judgment of the first instance court as regards PERSON . The other CARDINAL applicants , PERSON and PERSON also appealed against their conviction . Pursuant to the law No . CARDINAL , promulgated on DATE the case - file was transferred to a non - military court , namely , ORG . On DATE ORG delivered its decision . It upheld the sentence of PERSON . As to the applicants PERSON and PERSON , ORG ordered that the criminal proceedings be terminated on the ground that the statutory time - limit under LAW of LAW had expired .
The decision was not officially served on the applicants . However , the applicants’ lawyer obtained a copy of this decision in DATE .
